These patent leather loafers from Dune London are a smart choice for everyday wear. They feature a classic penny loafer shape wit ruched side detailing and a metallic badge across the toe for a signature finishing touch.

product_name: Sparkle Stiletto Heel Pointed Court Shoes
description: Elevate your evening looks with these sparkling court shoes by Dune London. They're designed with a chic pointed toe, semi-sheer mesh sides and a mid-height stiletto heel, all embellished with glittering diamantes. These party-ready heels are complete with a shimmering golden insole.

Bring a refined choice to your collection with these Dune London loafers. They're made in an easy slip-on design from leather for a premium touch. Two tassels give an elegant look. Finished with a cleated flatform sole to ensure a sturdy feel.

These leather ballet pumps are a versatile addition to your shoe collection. They're made with a flat heel for all-day comfort. A square toe and statement buckle detail on the front add a contemporary feel.

product_name: Suede Snaffle Trim Square Toe Loafers
description: Add extra polish to your ensembles with these premium suede loafers from Dune London. These timeless slip-ons feature a contemporary square toe and a low block heel. A gleaming gold-tone snaffle trim showcasing branded detailing provides a sophisticated, eye-catching finish.

product_name: Leather Bar Trim Block Heel Loafers
description: These smart leather loafers from Jones Bootmaker are a versatile pick for your footwear collection. They're made in a traditional slip-on style, with a low block heel for a gentle lift. The gleaming gold-tone bar trim adds refinement, while a leather lining offers all-day breathability.

These leather Mary Janes from Dune London will add a traditional touch to any outfit. They're made with an easy round-toe shape and a block heel for a timeless look. Complete with a strap and gold-tone buckle for a luxe finish.
